name: Race For Reallife
description:
In the past, the world used to be plentiful, but one day, people dumped a lot of garbage, causing the degradation of the world, causing severe damage, resulting in a lack of oxygen, leaving only 3 cities and oxygen is running out. Therefore, oxygen from the outside of the city was born, which is waste to be recycled into oxygen, but it was not the only city that was able to find them, so there was a fight.

How To Play

W = Move Forward

A = Turn Left

S = Move Backward

D = Turn Right

Spacebar = Hand Brake

R = Reset Position
